it.simonedegiacomi.goboxapi.utils

Class URLBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.simonedegiacomi.goboxapi.utils.URLBuilder

  • public class URLBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    This object is used to store the urls to use by the client and other GoBox API classes. Created on 09/01/16.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static URLBuilder DEFAULT
      Default empty url builder

    • Constructor Summary

        Throws:

        public void init()
          throws java.io.IOException
        Load the url builder with the default file in the resources folder

      • get

        public java.net.URL get(java.lang.String what)
        Return a new url specifying the key
        Parameters:
        what - The key (alias of the url)
        Returns:
        Corresponding url. If the url doesn't exist a null pointer will be returned

      • getURI

        public java.net.URI getURI(java.lang.String what)
        Return the specified url in uri
        Parameters:
        what - Name of the url
        Returns:
        Uri

      • get

        public java.net.URL get(java.lang.String what,
                        com.google.gson.JsonObject params)
        Return a new url with the specified parameters serialized in the url as query parameters. this method work only for string json property. This method is an alias for get(String, JsonObject, boolean), called with false as last parameter
        Parameters:
        what - Alias of the url
        params - Parameters to append to the url
        Returns:
        URL with the specified parameters serialized in query parameters.

      • get

        public java.net.URL get(java.lang.String what,
                        com.google.gson.JsonObject params,
                        boolean singleParam)
        Return a new url with the specified parameters serialized in query parameters Example: http://domain.com?json={"key"="value"}
        Parameters:
        what - Alias of the url
        params - Parameters to serialize
        singleParam - If true all the json will be serialized in only a single query string filed named 'json'
        Returns:
        Url with the specified parameters

      • addUrl

        public void addUrl(java.lang.String key,
                   java.net.URL url)
        Add a new url to the internal map
        Parameters:
        key - Alias of the url
        url - Url

      • removeUrl

        public void removeUrl(java.lang.String key)
        Remove the specified url from the internal map
        Parameters:
        key - Alias of the url to remove
